title: Zac should be reverted or receive major QoL changes
body:
I'm not a Zac fan, nor am I an avid Zac player. I don't care particularly much for him or if he stays in the gutter, but he is terrible to play right now. He's wonky af, especially his Q. His ulti should have 2 forms - the 2nd part where he liquidates and leaving his old ulti as is where when you just press R he jumps around.

Even if you get fed on him, he's nowhere near as effective as he use to be. I feel like I do zilch damage on him. Really negligible, especially early on in the game (this is coming from the guy that was COMPLAINING about Zacs insane damage before).

Worst champ in the game now.
